pages.text: Gonioceras is a nautiloid with a broad, low shell, flattened ventralliy and convexly rounded. The flattened shell suggests that Gonioceras may have been a benthic organism. It may have slowly swam around near the seafloor in search of food.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Egg
